flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Using two ATTiny 45s, two LEDs, two Cds cells, three resistors, a USB cable and a hobby servo you can create this head with about half the components and soldering that would be required if it was done with a bi-core and a 555 or 3909 and without having to hack the servo.

guide.summary: This is a simplified variation on the classic beam head that uses two ATTiny45 chips (one for the head behavior control and one for the eyes.)  It can be programmed using an Arduino as an ISP
guide.title: USB Powered Owl Head with "Breathing" light eyes.
